body_html:
I concur, search could use improvement. For example, I go to main API page and search for "segment_max" -- https://www.tensorflow.org/s/results/?q=segment_max&p=%2F

This gives "segment_max" as second result, but when you go there, it has broken images/broken links because it's actually for version 0.10

body:
I concur, search could use improvement. For example, I go to main API page and search for "segment_max" -- https://www.tensorflow.org/s/results/?q=segment_max&p=%2F

This gives "segment_max" as second result, but when you go there, it has broken images/broken links because it's actually for version 0.10
